product_name: Coleman Airbed with Headboard - Queen - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For unexpected guests at home or for homelike comfort when camping, this Queen-size airbed gets you up of the ground for a comfortable night's sleep no matter where you hang your hat.
short_description: For unexpected guests at home or for homelike comfort when camping, this Queen-size airbed gets you up of the ground for a comfortable night's sleep no matter where you hang your hat.
